name: the country cottage stocking
notes:
difficulty: easy 

standard us terms

pattern includes:
- detailed written directions with lots of photos to reference
- instructions for 2 sizes of stockings:
- large stocking: 17" x 7" - bulky (5) weight yarn - 6.5mm (k) hook
- small stocking: 15" x 6" - medium (4) wright yarn - 5.5mm (i) hook

this is the ad-free, easy to print version of this pattern. you can find the free version on my blog www.theturtletrunk.com
